desc: ＨＰが半分以下の時、防御力・回復力をアップ

dictionary.lore: A pearl with the power to heal injured lifeforms, found deep in the forests at the eastern end of the Principality of Vriksha. It's said that the pearl comes from millenial trees which infuse their vitality into these pearls in order to protect the creatures of the forest. Creatures who have been healed by their powers are eternally grateful to those magnificent trees.
